tech_stack: Vue.js, Vuex, Quasar, Capacitor, Electron, TypeScript, Axios, ESLint, Prettier
score_explanation: feature_completion: routes.js shows hotel management features; functionality: store/index.js has core state management; ui_ux_interactivity: index.template.html has responsive layout; code_quality: store/index.js uses namespaced modules; error_handling: auth/actions.js has basic token handling; best_practices: quasar.extensions.json configures env files; tech_stack_depth: uses Capacitor and Electron for cross-platform; github_usage: lacks README but has .gitignore; uniqueness_innovation: standard hotel management features; ai_generated_score: code patterns typical for Vue projects
summary: A functional hotel management system with core features implemented using Vue and Capacitor, showing good code organization but room for improvement in error handling and documentation.
strengths: modular state management in store/index.js, clear folder structure in src/, comprehensive environment configuration in quasar.extensions.json
improvements: add comprehensive error handling in auth/actions.js, implement proper testing in src/store/, create README.md for better documentation
